actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to repeal the recently enacted requirement of mandatory social security coverage for employees of nonprofit organizations.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Social Security Amendments of 1983 requiring mandatory coverage under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance program for all employees of nonprofit organizations for service performed after December 31, 1983.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the recently enacted requirement of mandatory social security coverage for employees of nonprofit organizations.
